text: Sir William Randal Cremer was an English Member of Parliament. Cremer was born 18 March 1828. He was a pacifist. Cremer won the Nobel Peace Prize in 1903. It was mostly for his work on the 1897 Anglo-American arbitration treaty. He was knighted in 1907. Cremer died from pneumonia on 22 July 1908. title: Randal Cremer
